post.text: Michelle Obama is on the trail for Hillary today in Virginia. Catch it live here.

comment.author: Lauren
comment.text: Can somebody name one achievement Hillary has had in thirty years for the good of the American people? just give me one thing she has done that benefited the American people and not a special interest group.

replies.author: Ashley
replies.text: The bill supporting 911 First responders at ground zero.

replies.author: Lauren
replies.text: and thats not the American people. Thats a special intrest

replies.author: Corbin
replies.text: She worked her butt of getting health care for the children of th his country!

replies.author: Ashley
replies.text: The 911 First responders are a special interest group???? They are Americans who risked their lives to help save other Americans. Get real
